iana.template_text:
(registered 2014-02-07, last updated 2014-02-07)

Name : Regis Dehoux

Email : biznis&regadou.net

MIME media type name : Text

MIME subtype name : Vendor Tree - vnd.a

Required parameters : N/A

Optional parameters :

The charset parameter can be used to specify the charset encoding of the
underlying text. If this parameter is not specified, utf-8 will be assumed
if 8 bit bytes are encountered. If no 8 bit bytes are encountered, then
us-ascii will be assumed.

Encoding considerations : 8bit

Security considerations :
the security issues associated with this type have not been assessed

Interoperability considerations :

Local file paths can create problems when a text/vnd.a file is exchanged 
between a windows system and a non-windows system.

If a text file is not utf-8 encoded, has not specified a charset and 
contains characters that uses the 8th bit, undefined behavior will happen


Published specification :

Ongoing writing specification can be found at http://regadou.net/a

Applications which use this media :

The A language, a framework to build domain specific languages. The 
framework
is currently in active development. The first open source implementation of
this framework will be released and available soon. You can find more 
information
at http://regadou.net/a

Fragment identifier considerations :

Fragment will cause the text after the # sign to be interpreted as A 
language source text.
The viewer agent should display the result evaluation of the expression
following the pound sign (#) instead of the evaluation of the whole 
source file.

Restrictions on usage :
N/A

Provisional registration? (standards tree only) :
N/A


Additional information :

1. Deprecated alias names for this type : N/A
2. Magic number(s) : N/A
3. File extension(s) : a
4. Macintosh file type code : N/A
5. Object Identifiers: N/A

N/A

Person to contact for further information :

Intended usage : Common

Author/Change controller : N/A
